how_it_works.title: How Our Platform Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Discover how simple it is for home health agencies and independent specialists to connect.
signup.title: Sign Up
home.title: Personalized Connections for Quality Care
home.description.line1: Are you a home health agency looking for trusted specialists?
home.description.line2: Our platform connects you with certified independent professionals—nurses, therapists and more—ready to support your patients.
home.description.line3: Fast, reliable, and tailored to your needs.
rightTalentTitle: The Right Talent at Your Fingertips
rightTalentDescription: Are you a home care agency seeking skilled professionals for your team? Our healthcare job marketplace facilitates connections with highly qualified specialists ready to join your workforce. From Certified Nursing Assistants (CNAs) to Physical Therapists (PTs) and Occupational Therapists (OTs), find the perfect candidates to offer top-quality care to your patients.
optimizeStaffingDescription: Do you need personnel to meet your clients' demands? Our platform connects you with a network of healthcare professionals ready to work. Streamline staffing management and ensure you have the right talent for every role. From therapists to home health aides, we cover all your hiring needs.
specialist_description: Are you a healthcare specialist looking for new opportunities? Connect directly with home health agencies that value your skills. We offer flexible jobs for Physical Therapists (PTs), Speech Therapists (STs), Certified Nursing Assistants (CNAs), and more. Choose the projects that fit your availability and expectations.
benefits_intro: By choosing our healthcare marketplace, you gain a range of benefits that make the process of finding and hiring healthcare professionals more efficient and secure.
benefit_quality_text: We only work with verified and highly trained professionals. Every specialist on our platform has gone through a rigorous selection process to ensure you receive the best possible care.
benefit_efficiency_text: Our platform is designed to be intuitive and fast, allowing you to find the right personnel in minutes. This means you can meet your care needs without unnecessary delays.
benefit_flexibility_text: We offer a wide range of services that adapt to your needs and schedule. Whether you need short- or long-term assistance, you can customize your search to find the perfect professional.
benefit_security_text: Security is our priority. All our processes are designed to be reliable and secure, ensuring that all parties involved have a positive and protected experience.
signup.home_health.title: HOME HEALTH COMPANY
signup.home_health.description: As a Home Health agency, you can quickly find the medical specialists you need by filtering by specialty and ZIP code. Our platform ensures fast and secure access to qualified professionals, helping you cover cases efficiently with just a push notification.
signup.specialist.title: SPECIALIST
signup.specialist.description: As an independent specialist, you can promote your specialized services and expand your client base by connecting with patients and other healthcare professionals in our network. This will help increase your visibility and reach more people in need of your services.
password_validation_chars: Password is required and must contain 8 to 20 characters, at least one special character, and one uppercase letter.
phone_format: Phone number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
fax_number_format: Fax number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
website_valid: The inserted value is not a valid website
reminder_signup_note: Note: Please be reminded that you are responsible for thoroughly reviewing the information of specialists and patients prior to acceptance. It is imperative to ensure that all details are carefully assessed to maintain the quality and safety of our services. Your diligence in this matter is crucial for the well-being of our clients and the effectiveness of our operations.
personal_phone_format: Phone number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
patient_age_range: Patient Age is required and must be between 0 and 100.
description_required: Description is required and must be at least 10 characters long.
payment_positive: Payment must be a positive number.
information_text: To contact a specialist, you must have a registered card. You can register it in the My Info section.
add_payment_method: Please add your payment method to continue
phone_business_format: Phone number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
fax_business_format: Fax number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
wesbite_business_invalid: The inserted value is not a valid website
are_you_card_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this card?
are_you_card_remove_2: Once removed, any pending balance will be charged immediately to this card before deletion.
privacy_line_1: CareBridge Pro Corp ("CareBridge Pro", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.
privacy_line_2: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit or use our platform and services.
point1_description_1: Personal Information: full name, email, phone, credentials, etc.
point1_description_3: Usage Data: IP address, device info, etc.
point2_description_2: Connect home health agencies and specialists.
point3_description_2: Shared only with service providers or as required by law.
point4_description_1: We use reasonable safeguards to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure.
point5_description1: You can access, update or delete your data by contacting us at sales@carebridgepro.com.
point6_description1: We are not responsible for external websites linked through our platform.
point7_description1: We do not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18.
point8_description1: We may update this policy. Material changes will be notified.
point9_description2: 📬 CareBridge Pro Corp – 2721 SW 149th Pl, Miami, FL 33185
specialist_modal_update_phone_format: Phone number must be in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
specialist_modal_update_license_exp_requ: Medical license expiration date is required.
auth_sucess_already_card: You already have a card on file. Thank you! 💪
apps.title: App Store
apps.subtitle: Download our mobile apps for Specialists and Home Health agencies
apps.instructions: Access all CareBridge Pro features on the go. Choose the version that fits your role and manage your services quickly, securely, and efficiently.
